title: Metastore linkage
test_description: Validate Metastore linkage with Azure AD integration
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const metastoreStep = stepResults.get_metastore; const expected_result = 'Metastore: Linked'; let actual_result = 'Metastore ID: Not found'; if (metastoreStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } const apiOutput = metastoreStep.data; if (!apiOutput || !apiOutput.result || !apiOutput.result.data_array || apiOutput.result.data_array.length === 0) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No metastore data found in response', code: 'NO_METASTORES', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } const metastoreValue = apiOutput.result.data_array[0][0]; if (metastoreValue) { actual_result = 'Metastore ID: ' + metastoreValue; return { status: 'pass', message: 'Metastore found and linked: ' + metastoreValue, code: 'METASTORE_LINKED', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Metastore ID is empty', code: 'EMPTY_METASTORE', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
